Uses of Class
items.Item

  • Packages that use Item 
    Package Description
    crew  
    items  
    main  

    • Uses of Item in crew

      Methods in crew that return types with arguments of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Item> CrewState.getInventory() 
      Methods in crew with parameters of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CrewState.addItemToInventory(Item item)
      adds an item to the crew's inventory.
      void CrewState.removeItemFromInventory(Item item)
      removes an item from the crew's inventory.

    • Uses of Item in items

      Subclasses of Item in items 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConsumableItem
      Item abstract subclass that can be used on a CrewMember a limited number of times.
      class  GenericRestorationItem
      generic ConsumableItem subclass that can increase a CrewMember's fullness or health (or both).
      class  PlagueCure
      ConsumableItem subclass that has the effect of removing the PLAGUED effect from a CrewMember.
      class  ShipPart
      Item subclass that represents the ShipParts that players must locate to win the game.
      class  ShipShieldUpgradeItem
      Item subclass that implements the ShipUpgrade interface.
      class  ShipWeaponItem
      Item subclass that implements ShipUpgrade and acts as a weapon that can be attached to a Ship object.
      Methods in items that return Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Item Item.copy()
      creates a new copy of this Item.
      Item GenericRestorationItem.copy() 
      Item PlagueCure.copy() 
      Item ShipWeaponItem.copy() 
      Item ShipShieldUpgradeItem.copy() 
      Item ShipPart.copy() 

    • Uses of Item in main

      Methods in main that return Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Item Planet.getRandomItem(java.util.Random generator)
      returns a random Item from the Planet's loot table.
      Methods in main that return types with arguments of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Item> Shop.getInventory()
      returns the Shop's inventory of Items.
      Methods in main with parameters of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int Shop.buyItem(Item item)
      buys an Item and adds it to the shop's inventory.
      int Shop.getBuyPrice(Item item)
      gets the price the Shop will buy an Item for.
      int Shop.getSellPrice(Item item)
      gets the price the Shop will sell an Item for.
      int Shop.sellItem(Item item)
      sells an Item and removes it from the shop's inventory.
      Constructor parameters in main with type arguments of type Item 
      Constructor and Description
      Planet(java.lang.String name, Shop shop, WeightedArrayList<Item> lootTable)
      Default constructor for Planet.
      Shop(java.lang.String name, java.util.ArrayList<Item> inventory, double buyModifier, double sellModifier)
      Initialises a Shop that sells items in a given inventory with buy and sell price modifiers.
      Shop(java.lang.String name, java.util.List<Item> galacticMedItems)
      Initialises a Shop object that sells items in a given inventory.
